website_summaries.verdict: An affordable travel blanket that's soft and attractive; it will keep you warm on cold-weather trips in the car.
pros: Soft fleece material in a good-looking plaid print
12-volt power cord is easy to plug in to vehicle power outlet
8 feet long power cord is versatile and user-friendly
Price falls on the lower end of the spectrum
cons: Some reports of faulty models that got too hot or quit working altogether

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and gave it as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and gave it as a gift for Christmas. 2-1-15, I received a call and a picture that the blanket caught on fire. DON'T buy
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hull

customer_reviews.title: Fire starter blanket
customer_reviews.text: Hardly had a chance to use before it tried to start itself on fire. Driving along in the car and it started melting itself. Smelled so bad we stuck it outside the window to rid ourselves of the burnt plastic smell. It could have started a car fire.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't heat at all!! But the edge of the blanket melted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft but seems a bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: Decent blanket that seems to work well. I actually bought this to put in my small dogs car bed to keep her warm in the winter months. The "problem" I have with this blanket is it feels like a piece of cardboard with fabric over it. I get it that there are electrical wires inside but it just feels a bit stiff. One thing to keep in mind is there is no settings or on/off button. Just plug it in and it works. I think it shuts off after a period of time as well but haven't used it long enough to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: ImBradWTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saw your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my blanket. My heater core went out on my car and we are in the process of getting it repaired, but dealing with the insurance. So I needed something to keep me warm during my commute to work. This blanket worked great the first day and then didn’t work after that! What a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: If the seller wants to refund me I would be happy. Or perhaps I just got a faulty one
customer_reviews.text: It does not even get warm. I had it plugged in for a long car ride, and it did not heat up. I would return it but now it is a week too late to return it. If the seller wants to refund me I would be happy. Or perhaps I just got a faulty one, I would be happy to exchange it to try a new one if the seller would consider that
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a long life.
customer_reviews.text: Update and rating change after 1 year: I used this for the first time after a summer in the backseat. It no longer heats up. The light comes on when it is plugged in and the car port works to charge phones, etc so I know it isn’t the car. I mean, it still works as a blanket, but I had plenty of those. This heats up fast. I love it. It is lap sized, so not too bulky. I purchased this because my SUV takes much longer to warm up than my car. I’m much more comfortable with this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Watch where you put the cord
customer_reviews.text: Nice, warm, heavy duty blanket. Caution with the long cord. Tripped my wife, getting out of the vehicle and about broke her leg and messed up her back. Now we plug into the socket in the back seat. She isn't a klutz, as we have another version that is 10 years old--with a shorter cord. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Risin

customer_reviews.title: Just like mom used to make it.
customer_reviews.text: You know what boys? I didn’t realize it was going to be so small but this blanket fits perfectly inside of a sleeping bag and I’m using it connected to a Jackery portable power station. This blanket is 12 V but the material is very soft. About 4 x 7‘. If you plug this blanket into a car it’s fine or if you decide to plug it into a portable power station for my experience, it pulls about 43 W of power. it’s very very soft. It’s very lightweight and the cord is long enough. Give this blanket a try, if not for you, for a pet or as a warm place to sit in the car.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan stofer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product broken. The plug was broken in the sealed package. They're weren't any pieces of the broken plastic so it obviously was broken before it was packed up. Additionally it didn't come the plastic carrying bag that it is advertised in. The blanket feels cheap and even if it was in working conditions I would have used it. After reading the reviews I can't believe I even purchased it in the first place. Bad quality. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Struhs

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive leg heater if you don't have a heater in your car
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times & was a great option to avoid replacing the heater in my car for $1200. Just be careful not to leave it plugged in when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shepherdson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! It drained my car battery when I forgot about it :(
customer_reviews.text: It does get warm, the plug is convenient, and it would be nice if you had a car where the heat doesn't circulate properly. It's also probably not a bad idea to have for emergencies. However, I bought it hoping to make getting into the car on bitterly cold mornings more bearable for my toddler, and it doesn't get warm enough fast enough to solve that problem. The car seat gets so cold overnight, I'd probably need a blowtorch to heat it up. The most memorable thing about this blanket, though, is that I forgot to unplug it the second time I used it and it drained my car battery. Not all cars will let that happen, but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So shopped on Amazon and found the brand (carcozy2) I had before and bought that one which works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after the car blanket I had for several years. It never really was warm. I could not tell if it was warm or just that the double layer eventually felt warm due to body heat. But after one month it differently did not warm at all. So shopped on Amazon and found the brand (carcozy2) I had before and bought that one which works great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this. However, the one I received does not get very hot. I do drive an older pickup so it could be the vehicle and not the blanket. I still use it every morning though!!
customer_reviews.author: LPetty

customer_reviews.title: Kept us nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for a trip to Fairbanks Alaska for friends visiting from Australia. Kept us nice and toasty. The only thing we would have liked better was if it had a hi/lo setting. It's either on or off. But the price and quality were great (thick and fluffy cozy blanket)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah and David

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Toasty even if it 25 out side the car!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. I work swings and graves and it snows a lot. Now I can go take my hour break in my car and relax all warm and cozy. If I do get snowed in, I know I have the blanket to keep me warm till the freeway is cleared. It can't get any better then this!
customer_reviews.author: Pursley

customer_reviews.title: Warm blanket material, but the electric warmer part doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: The blanket itself is made of good material, however, the electric warmer part doesn't work well at all. It takes 40 minutes to even feel warm and when it is, it is only about half the blanket. I have other electric blankets that are not for car use, and this is not as good quality as them. Not sure if i just got a dud blanket or if they are all like this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: For the love of god, DO NOT BUY THIS! Ours doesn’t get hot or even warm. It’s literally just a blanket with a cord. It also has a warning label: “caution may cause cancer.” WHAT?!?!! I should’ve read reviews first, usually I do but I figured this would be such a great gift. Turns out it’s just a hazard. Some of the reviews say there’s caught fire whereas ours didn’t even get warm. Again, do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket so that you can drive comfortably with someone who is always cold.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone who has trouble staying warm. They really love it and use it all the time. Heated seats can only do so much and this really makes a difference. I was worried about it not getting hot enough or working that well, but so far it seems to be doing really well. Get it if you have someone who wants to cook you out of the car with the heater and you just want to be able to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Warm heated 12v blanket
customer_reviews.text: I used this blanket in the pickup on my way hunting, ran it off a generator for an hour while camping to warm up, and used it to keep newborn puppies warm when taking them to the vet. Gets warm pretty quick and is nice soft fleece. I'm not sure how it will fair being washed so I docked a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Fast and hot
customer_reviews.text: My teen's older car heater takes awhile to heat up, sometimes not reaching a comfortable temperature until she's arrived at her destination. She said this blanket is awesome, heats fast, and she doesn't even need the heater. For reference, the temperature has ranged from 25-45 F since we've had the blank.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing - doesn't warm from plug-in (in other words, just another blanket)
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could leave less than one star. It's a nice enough blanket but only warms a very little bit. The temps here were in the low 20s. Even after half an hour, with my glove off, I wasn't even sure if it *was* warm (or if I was just feeling my own body heat under the blanket).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. It is much bigger than we needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. It is much bigger than we needed for our toddler to use while in his carseat but, it warms up nicely and yet he doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Anna A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Thick nice looking blanket but has serious problems with heating element.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick blanket, but the electrical heating elements do not work very well. Worked pretty good the very 1st time I used it but after that most of blanket does not heat up at all. Only heats up about one foot in diameter from the where the cord connects on the blanket. I really wanted this to work out but may need to return it due to it not working properly. The blanket itself is really nice but I need a heated blanket and this blanket has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Life saving!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely one of the best purchases I’ve ever made in my life! The blanket is EXTREMELY soft, and once you plug it in and have the car turned on, it gets warm pretty quickly. I moved to Massachusetts from Texas a few years ago, and I don’t think I’ll ever get used to how cold it is. I found this blanket and wanted to get it so that I don’t have to freeze in the car on road trips. Honestly, if you live where the winters are rough or are just cold natured, this is a great product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't leave this running too long...
customer_reviews.text: Well, the blanket worked reasonably for a few days, but a slight complaint at not having a temperature control. Admittedly, this is operator error, but one day, we accidentally left this running all day while driving, and this got to the point where it overheated itself, and smelled up the entire car with the smell of burnt plastic. Weeks later, after removing the unit, the car still has a faint burnt plastic odor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fabric - will only ever be a "warming blanket"
customer_reviews.text: Love the high quality fabric nice and heavy, not the cheap fabric you sometimes get. Feels nice on hands and cozy on your lap. But know this is not really a heating blanket. It will only get "warm". There is no low/med/high. It is only warm to the touch and it does take about 15 min to get to warm status. But once warm it is a steady warm. If you live in the midwest like I am and are counting on it keeping your legs warm when it is -10-30 below in the car....you need something with higher heat settings. Would buy again for quality of fabric or if I lived in less harsh cold.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Finch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a black and red blanket and received a black and white instead.
customer_reviews.author: MNnurse

customer_reviews.title: It's a blanket
customer_reviews.text: Overall I was disappointed. It takes forever to actually heat up, when it does you get more heat from the fleece blanket then you do the electrical heat. We had it running for less than 10 minutes and the plug started overheating and smelt like it was melting. So unless you want to ruin your car I do not recommend leaving plugged plugged in for longer than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great blabket for the car
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket! I'm a person who is ALWAYS cold, so in the car the first thing I do is crank the heat up to ninety degrees and roast the hubby and kids. This year for Valentine's day the Mr. brought home flowers and this blanket and our car trips have been more peaceful. I'm toasty and warm and he's nice and cool. I would recommend this to every one!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: THIS BLANKET WILL START A FIRE
customer_reviews.text: I plugged the blanket in and within five minutes my fuse box started smoking and arc flashed. The next day my check engine light came on and I took it in and they said the computer was fried. Don't buy ever!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No More "I'm FREEZING!"
customer_reviews.text: My wife seems to have been born on the sun, which means that she's always cold when we drive just about anywhere. Sick and tired of arguing over the air conditioner, I discovered this handy little gadget. Now I can stay cool and alert and she can stay warm under her blanket. Its cord is even long enough to reach from the dash power port all the way to the back seat without problems. It does take a few minutes to warm up, but the actual blanket itself is pretty toasty on its own. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Wraithdude

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I did return it. However, it was because I didn’t understand the mechanics of lead acid batteries. My car battery died because I used it overnight (you’re not supposed to fully drain lead acid batteries). It would be great for use on car trips (while the car is running), or if someone is just running into the store to quickly get something. It’s warm, not hot.
customer_reviews.author: n@han.A

customer_reviews.title: Warms well
customer_reviews.text: Warms well. Purchased this to help keep my little dog warm in the car while I'm at the gym during the winter months. Tried it for the first time while grocery shopping and it was nicely warm when I returned and most importantly my dog was laying on it. (She would not lay on a warming pad I purchased for her last year). It does not get hot, which is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Travel Friendly
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the back of our car and use it when traveling on long road trips (we love taking scenic drives - my husband is a landscape photographer), going to the drive-in movies, and even taking out to use as a blanket for a picnic or Spring Training baseball game. We actually bought two! One for the backseat for the kids to share, and one for us adults to share in the front seats. They're very large and super comfortable. It heats up quickly and nicely. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wash, its hard to use it for longer time or even when it is new.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I placed the order, I tried several time to cancel it, but they have sent it and costing too much in return shipping as well. Its not worth even trying it ( if hygiene matters to you )
customer_reviews.author: Aseem J.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a regular blanket instead.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself because I’m always cold in the car. This blanket wasn’t any warmer than using any other regular blanket. I could barely tell that it was on after an hour. I returned it and put a regular blanket in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy to keep my husband and I from fighting over the heat in the car.. *Works as described*
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described. My husband is 240 pounds and I am only 110 pounds, so ofcourse I am always freezing and he is always warm. Before this blanket he would say I was "roasting him out the car".. NOT ANYMORE. Even when I am driving I can plug this in and lay it over my lap OR drape it behind my back, that way I can turn the heat down in the car a little so my husband is comfortable and yet I stay warm at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Graham

customer_reviews.title: The one (of two) I bought doesn't heat, but the blanket is pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty blanket and you can feel the coils that are supposed to heat in the blanket, and the light for the plug in goes on - but the blanket doesn't warm up. I'm very disappointed in this product and now regret getting 2 of them. But it's still nice to have a good blanket in the car during winter here in Minnesota. I did not contact the seller to tell them of my disappointment because it had been almost 2 months before I used one for the first time. I should have checked it out when I first got them. The 2nd blanket is still in the package and may work as intended... I don't know yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Scepurek

customer_reviews.title: Watch pricing
customer_reviews.text: I was so mad about this item. I ordered it for 23.99, then the next day the price dropped to 17.99. I went to cancel the order and order 2 at the discounted price, it showed cancellation was pending. However, it didn’t cancel (although shipping had not even started), so I received ALL the blankets. I was going to return it, but found I would get charged for shipping. So irritating.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get warm!
customer_reviews.text: After a long drive, I couldn't even tell if this was on. There is no temperature control and I kept checking to make sure it was even plugged in. It barely, barely has the slightest bit of warmth. Very disappointing. I've seen other reviews (should have checked those first - sigh-) that some people's got too hot, and some caught on fire, so I guess I got off easy. Returning right away.
customer_reviews.author: DucksFanatic

customer_reviews.title: 2 blankets, neither heated
customer_reviews.text: we purchased one of these. tried it in the car and it never heated. returned it. we got a second one. we had it plugged in for 45 minutes and it never heated up. the seller was GREAT about the return. they even paid for a UPS pickup at our home.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Nancy Yates

customer_reviews.title: Okay value in the right circumstance
customer_reviews.text: This product is reasonably priced and you get what you pay for. It's very soft, the size is reasonable for a one person lap blanket. We used it outside for warmth 4-wheeling in the cold. It blocked wind, but didn't provide much extra warmth. Would probably be okay inside a car though. Also the fact that it needs spot cleaning isn't acceptable for our use. Out in the dust and mud it's filthy - not suitable for spot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: J Falch

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle, but definitely useful.
customer_reviews.text: My truck doesn't have any heat. I bought this to help with my 30min commute in Vermont winter. No, this is not a miracle blanket. I've been experimenting with this and am very satisfied so far. With the bundle sitting on your lap it feels like a warm cat is keeping you company. One layer doesn't do much to warm the hands, but borrowing into the pile feels nice. I recently drove 3 hours with this heating blanket sandwiched between myself and my robe on backwards. At the end of the drive my knees were sweating, torso was toasty, hands were okay and feet were ice cold. Folded up this would keep a critter nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with the packaging because it is suppose to be a gift. The outside was super dusty which I don’t understand and the front was all cut up. Who knows how much dust got in the actual blanket. It would be ok if it was just for me but it’s suppose to be a present so I am embarrassed to gift this. Hopefully it works too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR TRAVELING
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR TRAVELING! YOU CAN USE FOR KIDS BECAUSE THEY DO NOT GET SUPER HOT! JUST ENOUGH TO KEEP WARM!
customer_reviews.author: CHER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I asked......
customer_reviews.text: My wife is always cold. And we drive a lot. When I am too hot in the car, she is never hot enough. So, I found this and it does EXACTLY what we need. A fleece blanket that gives off heat. Happy wife = happy life!
customer_reviews.author: linogall

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas/Birthday present for my mom and SHE LOVES IT. It works great and the blanket is a durable material! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ble

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I cant really comment on the blanket as it didnt heat up when I received it. Im allowing for manufacturing issues, but Ive returned it and looking for another one, just not this brand. The quality seems well made, but something inside between the cord and heating element didnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Z

customer_reviews.title: 12V auto blanket
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get all that warm, it can't go in the washer, and it doesn't have an auto off button but I'm still happy I bought it. It's on my golf cart seat and when it's cold I just plug it in and get a warm toosh. Works well but is probably not top notch, but it was inexpensive so I think it's pretty great for what I paid for it. It's heavy so it stays on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: VICKY

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 days for this thing to start working and heat up. Its a hit or miss as to if it will actually work each time I plug it in. It does get warm but I drive a Jeep with no doors in the colder weather and it still isn't warm enough for my girlfriend
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: My family and dogs love these electric car blankets
customer_reviews.text: My family and dogs love these electric car blankets. I bought five of these and gave them out as xmas gifts. My small dog loves the heated blanket on cold days. The first one I bought lasted about five years before it came up missing, I some how think my kids had something to do with that!!!😉
customer_reviews.author: Randy Powers

customer_reviews.title: No temp control, little heat, can’t wash.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket to use in our off-road “car” (CanAm X3 side by side) and am very disappointed. There was barely any heat generated to keep me warm from the cold wind blowing in the “car” as we cruised the sand dunes. I think what little heat was being generated was immediately wiped out by the cold air and without any temperature control it wasn’t producing enough heat. If you are using in an enclosed vehicle it might work though. Also, upon returning home with a blanket covered in sand and dirty I discovered it wasn’t washable. That was not something I even thought to double check upon purchasing but I will for any future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I am always cold living in Wisconsin the winters suck. This is the best thing ever plug it into the car wrap myself up in it and go. It's a little small to share with the passenger side person but it can be done. It keeps up nice and quick and doesn't get too hot. There's no control for the heat level but that's not a downside at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift was appreciated.
customer_reviews.text: One problem is there is no auto shut off so if you forget it on in the car it will kill your battery. My husband loves it as he likes to snooze in the car while others are shopping. He did leave it on one night and the car would not start in the morning so be aware that you must take cf seeing it is unplugged and off yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, not machine washable, and has a cancer warning tag on the package.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this blanket. The blanket did not get warm at all!! I kept it plugged in for over 20 mins on my commute and it never warmed up. I thought about keeping it to use as a throw blanket for my 4 year old until I saw the cancer warning tag on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Witherow

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I'm a school bus driver, I'm using the blanket right now, it's not as warm as I think it should be, not warm throughout the blanket. Could be at least a foot wider for better coverage. I think it should have a central plug with 2 cords, one for the accessory and one for the wall, that would make it much better
customer_reviews.author: s morrison

customer_reviews.title: Warm at last!
customer_reviews.text: I am always cold and everyone else is hot. Traveling together isn't the greatest because someone is uncomfortable. This blanket is perfect. I can cuddle up in the blanket and be toasty while everyone else is cool and comfortable. I was surprised by how well it worked. There is no temperature control. It is on or off. My only reservation with this item. Mostly, I am just so happy with the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it the first time and it didn’t work so I tried to refund it. Instead of just giving me a refund they send a second one which also didn’t work and now I’m charged for two useless blankets
customer_reviews.author: Nikita B

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket but can't be washed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our truck is not dual zone and hubby is always hot. We've had it now for about a year and it still works but needs to be cleaned. I went to the reviews to see if anyone had washed it to and found out no. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: UMnMC

customer_reviews.title: Does not get warm enough
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my three grandchildren on cold morning car trips to school. It is impossible to buckle carseats with heavy coats on so a blanket is the perfect solution. Unfortunately, when it is really cold this does not produce much warmth. Turn up the heat a little, please.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: A blanket with a wire attached.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell if this works. I feel minor (almost unnoticeable) warmth but not sure if it's just from my own body heat. My point being... if you have to wonder, it's probably not going to heat like you'd expect/hoped for. It's definitely drawing power from my battery though.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Maybe okay.... still undecided
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer is I have only used it once windy day in our golf cart I can’t say it felt very warm maybe a speck of heat but overall I am not impressed the cord is nice and long blanket feels a good quality and is a good size but I can’t say it felt heated just may be a spec warmer?
customer_reviews.author: The Empress

customer_reviews.title: It’ll keep you toasty.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. Especially since I do not have heated seats in my car. I only wish you were able to control the heat. A low, medium or high setting would make this perfect. As it is high is the only setting. So once it’s warm I reach down and unplug it. If I start to feel cool again just plug it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Pratt

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality blanket, very soft and thick. Comes in a nice plastic bag with handles so you can store it easily in the car. It doesn't get too warm but I didn't expect too much since it just plugs into the socket in the car. It works well for what we needed and I like it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Descent Product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that it heats up a lot, it gets warm but not a ton. The blanket is pretty warm on it's own, but I noticed that the blanket plus the heater once they come together, they keep you pretty warm. Still, the blanket on it's own does not warm up as much as I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: The Unbiased Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Car nap game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. Took a little longer than two days to get to me, but living in Massachusetts in the winter this is exactly what I needed. I have an extra long lunch hour at work and during the nicer months often nap in my car and this has made that so cozy and perfect. My car also doesn’t have seat warmers so on very cold days I can use it while my heat warms up. It warms up very quickly and doesn’t need the car to be fully started to work, just on.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Warmed My Frozen Heart
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST THING EVER INVENTED AND PURCHASED. I bought one and think I'm going to get a second one. The blanket is long enough to share but it feels so good I want one for my own. My son and sister ate constantly in the car with me and this winter has become bearable for drives now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly warm!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so nice to have! I drive an older Jeep, travel 30 miles early in the morning to teach at a small country school, and just could't have made it this winter without my blanket! Thanks so much for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My company bought me a new truck. It's nice but does not have climate control or heated seats. I was worried about getting it for that very reason. I always want it cool and my wife wants it warm. Buying this blanket was how we got through the winter months without constant disagreements about the temperature setting.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Does not get real hot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for my gr-grand kids to use in my truck because the heater doesn't always work. They love it. It is large enough to cover both girls & does not get to hot that I worry about it burning them. The cord is long enough that it reaches the back seat where they sit.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: I love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. My only downfall is that it takes a while to get all the way hot/warm but other than that it’s super convenient because we go on road trips a lot and some people get colder than others
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ward

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know these existed!
customer_reviews.text: Works very very well. Not too hot - not too cold - Goldilocks would be pleased. LOL. I even bought a 25 foot extension cord and used it while watching the Christmas Parade. Stayed nice and warm. Bought some for gifts as well and they were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: seywhut

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dogs because they shiver in the car all the time even with the heater on. they love it. they bunch up the blanket and just snooze away on a car trip. good buy for dogs. for people, it is ok I just lay it on my lap and it keeps me warm. just remember to unplug it when you get out of the car
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: How did I love without this before?! It's fantastic. It heats up super fast and is so soft. It is a good size and covers my lap and legs without being too in the way. The only downside is that it gets too hot sometimes in some places, so you have to adjust or unplug for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Stalwart - Electric Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased (2), wanted something to keep me warm while travelling or sitting in my vehicle, this does not get very warm, I have to put another blanket on top, just to keep the minimal anount of warmth on my legs. Will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Product Came Broken, Never Gets Warm
customer_reviews.text: Opened it and was very happy. Thick blanket nice material. Plugged it in and it never even gets warm. My product came broken i suppose? Read other reviews claiming the same thing, so i guess i should've known. I want a refund or another blanket that actually works?.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blanket for cold mornings or traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel blanket. It heats up quickly and the fabric is soft. It's perfect for cold mornings. I love to use it after I am done skiing and am waiting in the car for everyone to get off of the mountain. It's warm enough to use when you are outside and need a blanket to wrap up in.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Only good in theory
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these blankets, one for myself and the other two to give as gifts. My blanket only gets slightly warm after a 45 minute drive in the car. I miss the heated seats my old car had because the seats were warming me up long before the car was warm, that is what I was hoping to accomplish by using this blanket. #fail
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is always cold in the car waiting for it to heat up in the morning. This heats within moments and the blanket is very warm even when not plugged in. It comes in a nice plastic package that can easily be kept in the car for storage.
customer_reviews.author: terrylea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the price is so low for a great product and I like the color the size is good also . all my friends love them I use mine at home others use them in the car , truck and one uses his on a boat they are thick and large enough for most needs .great for inside or outside . I bought more already I cant get enough of a good thing .
customer_reviews.author: clifford b. saunders

customer_reviews.title: A very nice, must have for the car in the Winter Time!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep in the car for when we travel. It appears to be quite large and would easily fit over two people if needed. I have not tried it out, but with the quality of the material, I would imagine it will work just fine if we ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's been a fairly warm winter hair Priscilla been some chili nights this item has been a godsend to us until one night you left it plugged in as we went to the store we came out our battery was dead. Other than that we've had nothing but joy with this product
customer_reviews.author: COUNCILMOMMY

customer_reviews.title: Not too warm
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a tent camping trip with lows that reached 28 degrees. I would put it in my sleeping bag 30 min before bed and plug it in. I was warm through the night but not too hot. I bought a second one for my dad after that trip!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Failed right away at 10 volts- not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one failed in less than 8 hours of gentle use (on a bed) at 10 volts. Fingers crossed for the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome C.

customer_reviews.title: Warms up fast, not too hot
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great. It warms up quickly but not so hot where you have to unplug it to cool down. New Jersey winters are rough and this gets the job done. I use it to sit on in the car. I draped it over the back of my driver seat then zip tied it around the headrest so it doesn’t fall down. It works well and stays in place for the most part. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D Perino

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is okay. I doesnt heat up as much as I'd like, I do have an older car, but I dont think its because my car cant handle the voltage of use by the blanket. It works, just dont expect it to get hot by any means. It will keep you warmer.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for that person who’s always cold.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom recovering from leukemia and stem cell transplant. She’s constantly cold. I mean, heated seats + max temp control in the car and she still shivers. The blanket makes her snuggly warm and is great for the two hour drives to the hospital!
customer_reviews.author: ZBO

customer_reviews.title: Makes for cozy and warm car rides.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very cozy. It does not have a temperature control but I knew that. It just gets warm like I would expect a low setting to get. I am always cold and this will help me cope with my husband who is always hot in car rides. We can both be happy now while venturing out in the world together. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get a heated blanket for my car and I have been researching them for months to find one with good reviews that I liked. So I was very sad when this one finally got here (I ordered it when it was out of stock) and it doesn't heat up... MAJOR bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't wash it but it's a good blanket
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot,no temp control it doesn't advertise that it does though, only complaint I have is can't wash it in the washing machine I bought mine for riding side by side so being able to wash it is kind of a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blanket because our car did not come with heated rear seats. Car seats in the northeast winters are very cold and take a lot of time to warm. The blanket has been working well. It's easy to use. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cat People

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter as a Christmas present. It’s really nice colors - I got the yellow and brown plaid pattern. It’s nice to keep in the car for emergencies or for just needing to bring cozy on an drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stand to have the heat on in the car, drys me out! So, the blanket is great across my lap, keeps my knees from aching! There is no heat adjustment! Bought one for my mom who has RA! Keeps her nice and warm! I love it! And it’s inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and my sister loves it! It heats up faster than the car heaters and doesn't get too hot for comfort. It fits easily back in the plastic storage bag so it doesn't get dirty and is small enough to store under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Heat is spotty. Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, but it only gets warm in a couple of spots. I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy-Owen

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great for fibro!
customer_reviews.text: Take a basic old car add this heated blanket a BAM! Heated seat! Lol works great! Helps soothe my fibromyalgia and warns me up! Great deal. There is no heat control, just plug it in. Gets good and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: There is no temp control ot on/off switch, just plugging it in, which is OK but it would be a better product with controls. Also the amount if hest it generates is slight. I get that yis may be a safety issue but more heat would be better. Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this blanket. Great idea, works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beck and Gund

customer_reviews.title: Let me just say it’s not awful...
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that it’s not awful. It’s handy and very cool that you can use it in the car. I plugged it in and let it heat up for an hour long car ride. It never really warmed me up. I was debating the entire ride whether it was my body heat or the blanket providing the warmth, I’ll just say it was a combination of the the two. I wouldn’t buy it again or recommend it but I’ll use it since I have it. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: cayla christine

product_meta.title: Stalwart - Electric Car Blanket- Heated 12 Volt Fleece Travel Throw for Car and RV-Great for Cold Weather, Tailgating, and Emergency Kits by Stalwart-BLACK/WHITE
product_meta.description: Color:BlackStay warm this winter with the Electric Car Blanket by Stalwart-the perfect cold weather accessory for your car or emergency kit. Plugs right in to your cigarette lighter, and with a 96-inch cord, this 12-volt fleece throw can even reach backseat passengers. Great for cars, trucks, SUV’s and RV’s, this heated throw will keep you warm while you travel, making it ideal for road trips, tailgating or camping! SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Stalwart is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Stalwart and ONLY Electric Car Blanket by Stalwart is GUARANTEED to be genuine. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Stalwart is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
feature_bullets: CAR ADAPTABLE- This soft 12-volt electric blanket plugs into any car, truck, SUV or RV cigarette lighter. Heats up quickly, and stays warm until you unplug it.
LONG CORD- Equipped with a 96-inch-long cord, even passengers in the backseat can stay cozy on cool weather road trips with this heated fleece throw.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND WARM-This lightweight auto blanket has thin wire that still gives off warm and comfortable heat. Blanket folds easily so it can be stored in a car trunk or in backseat without taking up too much space.
GREAT GIFT- This travel throw is the perfect cold weather accessory! Great for vehicle emergency kits, camping and tailgating, it’s a thoughtful gift for your friends and family this winter season.
PRODUCT DETAILS- Dimensions: 59” (L) x 43” (W), Cord length: 96”. Material: 100% Polyester. Color: Black and white. Care: Spot clean only- do not machine wash. Includes storage case with handles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,814 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
